backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing services and appointments with booking, validation, lookup, and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing phone-number and address-update tasks with affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata, fonts, icons, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping everything in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Appointment booking form with validation, service selection, backend submission, and success state UI.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Brand logo component rendering horizontal or square variants with size options.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing brand, navigation links, contact info, and social icons using centralized contact config.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with links, call-to-action buttons, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with a navbar, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Member: Animated membership section highlighting benefits and linking to contact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/OfferB: Displays a promotional banner with a limited-time offer message.
frontend/src/components/media/BeforeAfte: Image slider showing before-and-after transformations with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/media/GalleryGri: Grid layout displaying a set of salon-related gallery images.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqAcco: Accordion component listing frequently asked questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Animated section showcasing key salon services with icons and a link to full services.
frontend/src/components/sections/Stylist: Presents stylist profiles with photos, titles, and short bios.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays client testimonials with ratings in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Centralized configuration for phone, WhatsApp, email, and business hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookAppointment.ts: Provides a mutation to book appointments through the actor and refreshes appointment data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider with authentication state, login, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Tracks when an element becomes visible via IntersectionObserver and exposes a ref and visibility state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and utility classes for animations and gold-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the salon's About page with animated sections, story content, stylists, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ContactBookingPage.ts: Displays the booking page with a form, WhatsApp link, opening hours, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of salon work with animated sections, a grid display, and before/after slider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component featuring hero banner, intro text, service highlights, before/after slider, testimonials, and CTAs with scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services listing page showing categorized salon services with pricing, durations, benefits, and animated section reveals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
